org.hps.analysis.MC

Class IdentifyBadTracksDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.analysis.MC.IdentifyBadTracksDriver

  • public class IdentifyBadTracksDriver
extends Driver
    Driver to skim selected events from LCIO files based on track picking up the wrong hit. It outputs the bad track, the MCParticle associated with the bad hit, the truth hits associated with the truth match, and the track of the other particle associated with the bad hit (if any) This driver can only be run on MC readout with full truth.

    • Nested Class Summary
